name: Pixel Princess
description:
Pixel Princess allows you to turn vector lines into pixel art. üíï Install and don't forget to like and leave a comment! Share the link with friends: pixxxel.art


Select a vector object, open the plugin, enter pixel size, press ‚ÄúPixelate Selection‚Äù. While the plugin is open, any updates to the vector would be reflected in its pixel representation in real time.


Currently only lines are supported, fills aren't. Working on it! Primitives (rectangles, text, etc.) need to be flattened into regular vectors in order to be pixelated.
